response.original_title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Fellowship Of The Ring (Extended Edition)
response.overview: The first in a trilogy of films beloved by many, from the original books by renowned author, J.R.R.Tolkien, and directed by the infamous Peter Jackson. Fans of the films worldwide consider the extended editions of the Peter Jackson films to be the definitive versions.  Frodo must journey ahead beyond the realms of The Shire and Hobbiton. Carrying an unbearable burden, battling foes alongside new friends, The Fellowship Of The Ring must succeed in their mission to defeat the evil Sauron and all darkness that plagues the lands of Middle Earth.
response.tagline: The Extended Edition of the epic motion picture trilogy
response.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Fellowship Of The Ring (Extended Edition)
